data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miralles, Aurelien, Glaw, Frank, Ratsoavina, Fanomezana M., Vences, Miguel (2015): A likely microendemic new species of terrestrial iguana, genus Chalarodon, from Madagascar. Zootaxa 3946 (2): 201-220, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.2.3
